title: Chuunibyou demo Koi ga Shitai! Ren Specials
title_english: Love, Chunibyo & Other Delusions: Heart Throb Specials
title_japanese: 中二病でも恋がしたい！戀 未放送ショートムービー
title_synonyms: Chuunibyou demo Koi ga Shitai! 2 Specials
Chu-2 Byo demo Koi ga Shitai! Ren Specials
synopsis: The charming cast consisting of Rikka Takanashi and her friends continues spending time together through seven short episodes of fun games and idle chatter. Discover what is hidden inside Sanae Dekomori's hair buns, as well as other useless but fun facts about the beloved characters in Chuunibyou demo Koi ga Shitai! Ren Specials. [Written by MAL Rewrite]

Parent story.name: Chuunibyou demo Koi ga Shitai! Ren

ending_themes: "Van!shment Th!s World" (off vocal) by Black Raison d'être (Maaya Uchida, Chinatsu Akasaki, Azumi Asakura, Sumire Uesaka)
